memory: Pepper, I just want to let you know how much of a positive impact you've made on me over the time we've known each other. You helped me find hope in times when I was broken. You helped me try to improve myself because you genuinely wanted me to be a better person. You called me out when I did wrong and helped me realize the errors of my ways, allowing me to improve. It wasn't just your positive influence on me that allowed me to flurish. Your sense of humor, your unwaivering support for your found family and friends, your love and kindness, and most of all, your willingness to stand up for people who can't stand up for themselves. Of course, it wasn't all perfect. We've both argued and disagreed about things. However, I feel like that made our friendship stronger. Every day that goes by, the more I miss having you on my side. You were my sister, and you always will be. Your legacy will never die. I hope we can meet again soon. I miss you so much, sister. Until we meet again,

name: Shebang

name: Sophie

It was always fun watching shows, the latest MLP MYM, and even YouTube with you every week, Even when it frustrated me or us due to issues,  I deeply enjoyed the times we played Team Fortress 2 together, and regret not playing more games and spending more time with you..... I will forever cherish the memories I made with you, and will forever love you until the end of time. I hope you're proud of me and are watching over me as I grow, Rest easy, princess ðŸ’™
